name: Wild Dinosaur Battle Survival
description:
Dinosaur city battle survival adventure game where you can play as the ultimate wild dinosaur to fight against the tanks, soldiers and deadly helicopters. Experience this dinosaur battle attack survival missions and destroy the city by using the heavy weapon arsenal. The wild dino is the ultimate survival hero in this attack city battle arena. Get ready to show off the shooting skills as the dinosaur is equipped with the sniper and solo gun. Be the wild animal in this real time battle shooting attack city. Explore the 3D dinosaur battle attack city environment and complete the action-packed missions.

Get involve into the shooting city attack in survival game. Start wandering in the city for the destruction through the heavy weapons. Be the brave wild dinosaur. This is the ultimate survival mission that you need to complete as the wild animal dinosaur. If you are the dinosaur battle lover then you will definitely be going to love this dinosaur attack city survival adventure simulator. Fight with the soldiers and complete the target given to you within the time limit.

Time to move around the city to destroy the helicopters and tanks that are waiting for the wild Jurassic dinosaur. Attack in the city and start the destruction now. You don’t have much time. Be the ultimate survival wild animal in the city battle arena. The best shooting game is available for the wild dinosaur attack city lovers. Show the wild expertise in this dinosaur survival attack simulator. Test your sniper shooting skills to attack the soldiers and tanks. Unlock the guns with every successful mission of the dinosaur shooter city battle.

You as the ultimate wild dinosaur battle is free to make the destruction in the battle city. Be brave and move around freely equipped with heavy guns to attack the whole city and make the peaceful the battle arena. Play like the brave wild dinosaur as you have the real attacking expertise. Don’t miss the chance to make the disaster in the shooting battle arena. Experience different environments

FEATURES
• Ultimate dinosaur battle city attack simulator
• Rich, engaging and user interactive gameplay controls
• Real-time high-quality visual effects
• Follow the map for the directions to complete the survival missions
• Different heavy weapons to unlock
• Target based dinosaur attack city missions
